程序包的使用
org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler

  • 使用org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina.ha.jmx  
    org.apache.catalina.manager  
    org.apache.catalina.mbeans  
    org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler
    The Modeler component of the Commons project offers convenient support for configuring and instantiating Model MBeans (management beans), as described in the JMX Specification.
    org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler.modules
    Implementation classes - should not be used directly.
  • org.apache.catalina.ha.jmx使用的org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler中的类 
    类和说明
    Registry
    Registry for modeler MBeans.
  • org.apache.catalina.manager使用的org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler中的类 
    类和说明
    Registry
    Registry for modeler MBeans.
  • org.apache.catalina.mbeans使用的org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler中的类 
    类和说明
    BaseModelMBean
    Basic implementation of the DynamicMBean interface, which supports the minimal requirements of the interface contract.
    ManagedBean
    Internal configuration information for a managed bean (MBean) descriptor.
    Registry
    Registry for modeler MBeans.
  • org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler使用的org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler中的类 
    类和说明
    AttributeInfo
    Internal configuration information for an Attribute descriptor.
    BaseModelMBean
    Basic implementation of the DynamicMBean interface, which supports the minimal requirements of the interface contract.
    BaseNotificationBroadcaster
    Implementation of NotificationBroadcaster for attribute change notifications.
    FeatureInfo
    Convenience base class for AttributeInfo, ConstructorInfo, and OperationInfo classes that will be used to collect configuration information for the ModelMBean beans exposed for management.
    ManagedBean
    Internal configuration information for a managed bean (MBean) descriptor.
    NotificationInfo
    Internal configuration information for a Notification descriptor.
    OperationInfo
    Internal configuration information for an Operation descriptor.
    ParameterInfo
    Internal configuration information for a Parameter descriptor.
    Registry
    Registry for modeler MBeans.
    RegistryMBean
    Interface for modeler MBeans.
  • org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler.modules使用的org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler中的类 
    类和说明
    ManagedBean
    Internal configuration information for a managed bean (MBean) descriptor.
    Registry
    Registry for modeler MBeans.
